content.prompt: Which of the following features of the Great Mosque (Masjid-e Jameh) of Isfahan is typical of Persian architecture?

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.2: Purpose and Audience in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
